articles.title: Chandrayaan 2: NASA Finds ISRO's Vikram Lander on Moon - News18
articles.description: Almost three months after India lost contact with Chandrayaan-2’s Vikram lander while attempting a soft landing on the Moon’s South Polar region, a NASA satellite orbiting the Moon has found the crashed lander, the US space agency has said.
